str2: For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To blame, censure, find fault. Middle voice of an apparently primary verb; to blame.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.

parse: Verb - Aorist Imperative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: See! Lo! Behold! Look! Second person singular imperative middle voice of eido; used as imperative lo!
A day, the period from sunrise to sunset.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To come, go.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.
Lord, master, sir; the Lord. From kuros; supreme in authority, i.e. controller; by implication, Master.
And, even, also, namely.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: To bring to an end, fulfill, accomplish. From sun and teleo; to complete entirely; generally, to execute.
Fresh, new, unused, novel. Of uncertain affinity; new
From diatithemai; properly, a disposition, i.e. a contract.
On, to, against, on the basis of, at.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A dwelling; by implication, a family.
Of Hebrew origin; Israel, the adopted name of Jacob, including his descendants.

On, to, against, on the basis of, at.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A dwelling; by implication, a family.
Judah, Judas, Jude. Of Hebrew origin; Judah, a part of Palestine.
